Source.Name: hashcat
Source.Summary: World's fastest and most advanced password recovery utility
Source.Description: hashcat is the world's fastest and most advanced password recovery utility, supporting five unique modes of attack for over 200 highly-optimized hashing algorithms. hashcat currently supports CPUs, GPUs, and other hardware accelerators.
